017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
025import java.lang.reflect.Type;
026
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
030
031import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_DefaultGenericArrayType;
032import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_Type;
033
034/**
035 * A {@link GenericArrayType} implementation.
036 *
037 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
038 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
039 *
040 * @see GenericArrayType
041 */
042public final class DefaultGenericArrayType implements Constable, GenericArrayType {
043
044
045  /*
046   * Instance fields.
047   */
048
049
050  private final Type genericComponentType;
051
052  private final int hashCode;
053
054
055  /*
056   * Constructors.
057   */
058
059
060  /**
061   * Creates a new {@link DefaultGenericArrayType}.
062   *
063   * @param genericComponentType the generic component type; must not
064   * be {@code null}; should almost certainly be a {@link
065   * GenericArrayType}, a {@link java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType}
066   * or a {@link java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable}
067   *
068   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code genericComponentType}
069   * is {@code null}
070   */
071  public DefaultGenericArrayType(final Type genericComponentType) {
072    super();
073    this.genericComponentType = genericComponentType;
074    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
075  }
076
077  DefaultGenericArrayType(final Type rawType, final Type argument) {
078    this(new DefaultParameterizedType(null, rawType, argument));
079  }
080
081
082  /*
083   * Instance methods.
084   */
085
086
087  @Override // GenericArrayType
088  public final Type getGenericComponentType() {
089    return this.genericComponentType;
090  }
091
092  @Override // Constable
093  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
094    final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> genericComponentType = JavaTypes.describeConstable(this.getGenericComponentType());
095    if (genericComponentType.isPresent()) {
096      return
097        Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
098                                           MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_DefaultGenericArrayType,
099                                                                          CD_Type),
100                                           genericComponentType.orElseThrow()));
101    }
102    return Optional.empty();
103  }
104
105  @Override // Object
106  public final int hashCode() {
107    return this.hashCode;
108  }
109
110  private final int computeHashCode() {
111    return JavaTypes.hashCode(this);
112  }
113
114  @Override // Object
115  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
116    if (other == this) {
117      return true;
118    } else if (other instanceof GenericArrayType g) {
119      return JavaTypes.equals(this, g);
120    } else {
121      return false;
122    }
123  }
124
125  @Override // Object
126  public final String toString() {
127    return JavaTypes.toString(this);
128  }
129
130
131  /*
132   * Static methods.
133   */
134
135
136  /**
137   * If the supplied {@link GenericArrayType} is a {@link
138   * DefaultGenericArrayType}, returns it; otherwise creates a new
139   * {@link DefaultGenericArrayType} with the supplied {@link
140   * GenericArrayType}'s {@linkplain
141   * GenericArrayType#getGenericComponentType() generic component
142   * type} and returns it.
143   *
144   * @param genericArrayType the {@link GenericArrayType} to
145   * effectively copy (or return); must not be {@code null}
146   *
147   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link DefaultGenericArrayType}
148   *
149   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code genericArrayType} is
150   * {@code null}
151   *
152   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
153   *
154   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
155   * that it may return a new {@link DefaultGenericArrayType} with
156   * each invocation).
157   *
158   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
159   * threads.
160   */
161  public static final DefaultGenericArrayType of(final GenericArrayType genericArrayType) {
162    if (genericArrayType instanceof DefaultGenericArrayType) {
163      return (DefaultGenericArrayType)genericArrayType;
164    } else {
165      return new DefaultGenericArrayType(genericArrayType.getGenericComponentType());
166    }
167  }
168
169}
